name: Foyens Financial Solutions
overview:
Foyens Financial Solutions is a professional services Company offering finance and accounting services to small to mid-sized ventures. Foyens offers end-to-end services in the following areas:

– Financial Planning and Analysis – Financial Reporting – Accounting including General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable and more

We build up customized business processes for each client we provide by employing paramount technology & best practices with every client to fully meet their requirements which facilitate increased productivity, and profitability while minimizing risks and costs.

Foyens build up and acquire industry best practices facilitating companies to transition easily to an offshore & onshore model and our clients find it trouble-free to use our services as we offer extremely flexible engagement options together with:

– Providing single resource such as one position of financial analyst or multiple such positions. – Customized and flexible contract terms that are in tune with the client requirements – 30-Day cancellable provisions – Multi position discounts at more economical terms – 1-month free trial period* of our F&A services to facilate you to judge our services during the trial period at no cost.

In addition to offering superior resources and flexible engagement options, Foyens can help clients save 60% - 70% in local FTE costs based on its offshore-enabled pricing and over 40%-50% in local costs based on its onshore-enabled pricing. Foyens staff works round the clock so that clients get the benefit of overnight processing, but have time in the day for direct interaction.

Foyens Financial Solutions is an India based Company with operations in Bangalore, India having sales office located at Brisbane, Australia.
